channel.title: [Request] Torrent Uploader :)
channel.description:
[Request] Torrent Uploader :)
I looked everywhere for one of these and haven't found any yet. Basically I want the program to be a small program where you click on it and several input boxes will show up such as...
Torrent Name: Torrent Location on HD: Category of Torrent: Description of Torrent:
And stuff like that, and the script will automatically submit the torrents to the torrent websites which do not require registration such as these sites...
http://www.chomskytorrents.org/ http://www.digitalpanic.org/ http://www.donvitorrent.com/ http://www.fulldls.com/ http://www.isohunt.com/ http://www.itmn.org/ http://www.mininova.org/ http://www.newtorrents.info/ http://www.novatina.com http://www.seedler.org/ http://www.thepiratebay.org/ http://www.torrentbox.com/ http://www.torrentlocomotive.com/ http://www.torrentportal.com/ http://www.torrentsource.info/ http://www.torrentreactor.net/ http://www.torrentspy.com/ http://www.tracker.zaerc.com/ http://www.xtvi.com/
This has got to be possible. But if not, oh well, can't hurt to ask. Thanks in advance. :)
~Ron
